title: Guacamole Stuffed Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 400ÂºF. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Use a mallet to pound each chicken breast thin and flat.
Prepare the guacamole: mash the avocado flesh, and stir in diced onions and tomatoes.
Lay the chicken flat and spread the guacamole on each piece. Roll up the chicken, starting with the skinnier side, and secure the seam with toothpicks.
Lightly beat the egg in a shallow bowl. In a separate shallow bowl, combine almond flour and spices.
Roll the stuffed chicken through the lightly beaten eggs, let the excess drip off, and roll the chicken through the almond flour mixture. Place the chicken on the baking sheet.
Bake for 30 minutes, until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: 1/8 tsp. sea salt, unrefined and pure
